trans-unit.source: Binds the value of an HTTP request <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.Form*> field to a parameter object.
trans-unit.target: HTTP 要求的值繫結<xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.Form*>欄位至參數物件。</xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.Form*>

trans-unit.source: You can use the FormParameter class to bind the value of a form variable in the <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.Form%2A> collection to a parameter used in a parameterized query or command.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 FormParameter 類別繫結中的表單變數的值<xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.Form%2A>參數型的查詢或命令中使用之參數的集合。</xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.Form%2A>

trans-unit.source: Controls that bind data to the parameter might throw an exception if a FormParameter is specified but no corresponding form variable is passed.
trans-unit.target: 將資料繫結至參數的控制項可能會擲回例外狀況，如果已指定 FormParameter，但沒有對應的表單變數會傳遞。

trans-unit.source: They might also display no data if the form variable is passed with no corresponding value.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有對應值的表單變數傳遞，它們也可能會顯示任何資料。

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.DefaultValue%2A> to avoid these situations where appropriate.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.DefaultValue%2A>若要避免這些情況下，適當的位置。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.DefaultValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: The FormParameter class provides the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormParameter.FormField%2A> property, which identifies the name of the form variable to bind to, in addition to those inherited from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter> class.
trans-unit.target: FormParameter 類別會提供<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormParameter.FormField%2A>屬性，其可識別要繫結，除了從<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>類別</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>繼承的表單變數的名稱</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormParameter.FormField%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > The FormParameter does not validate the value passed by the form element in any way; it uses the raw value.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > FormParameter 不會驗證表單項目，以任何方式所傳遞的值; 它會使用原始值。

trans-unit.source: In most cases you can validate the value of the FormParameter before it is used by a data source control by handling an event, such as the `Selecting`, `Updating`, `Inserting`, or `Deleting` event exposed by the data source control you are using.
trans-unit.target: 在大部分情況下您可以驗證 FormParameter 值之前它所處理的事件，例如使用資料來源控制項`Selecting`， `Updating`， `Inserting`，或`Deleting`您使用的資料來源控制項所公開的事件。

trans-unit.source: If the value of the parameter does not pass your validation tests, you can cancel the data operation by setting the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property of the associated <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs> class to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果參數的值未通過驗證測試，您可以藉由設定取消資料作業<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>屬性相關聯的<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs>類別`true`。</xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs> </xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new unnamed instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormParameter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化新的具名執行個體的<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormParameter"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormParameter> object created with the FormParameter constructor is initialized with default values for all its properties.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormParameter>FormParameter 建構函式所建立的物件會使用其所有屬性的預設值初始化。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormParameter>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormParameter.FormField%2A> is initialized to <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormParameter.FormField%2A>會初始化為<xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormParameter.FormField%2A>

trans-unit.source: Additionally, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Name%2A> property is initialized to <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Type%2A> property is initialized to <xref:System.TypeCode?displayProperty=fullName>, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Direction%2A> property is initialized to <xref:System.Data.ParameterDirection>, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.DefaultValue%2A> property is initialized to null (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 此外，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Name%2A>屬性會初始化為<xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>、<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Type%2A>屬性會初始化為<xref:System.TypeCode?displayProperty=fullName>、<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Direction%2A>屬性會初始化為<xref:System.Data.ParameterDirection>，而<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.DefaultValue%2A>屬性會初始化為 null (`Nothing`在 Visual Basic 中)。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.DefaultValue%2A> </xref:System.Data.ParameterDirection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Direction%2A> </xref:System.TypeCode?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Type%2A> </xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the class with the values of the instance specified by the original parameter.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體類別的值所指定的執行個體 original 參數。

trans-unit.source: The FormParameter constructor is a `protected` copy constructor used to clone a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormParameter> instance.
trans-unit.target: FormParameter 建構函式是`protected`複製建構函式用來複製<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormParameter>執行個體。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormParameter>

trans-unit.source: The values of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormParameter>, including <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormParameter.FormField%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Name%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Type%2A> are all transferred to the new instance.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormParameter>，包括<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormParameter.FormField%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Name%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Type%2A>傳輸到新的執行個體。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Type%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Name%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormParameter.FormField%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormParameter>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormParameter"></xref> instance that the current instance is initialized from.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormParameter"> </xref>從初始化目前的執行個體的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new named instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormParameter"></xref> class, using the specified string to identify which form variable field to bind to.
trans-unit.target: 初始化新的具名執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormParameter"></xref>類別，來識別哪些變數欄位繫結至使用指定的字串。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormParameter> object created with the FormParameter constructor is initialized with the specified parameter name and string that identifies the form variable that the parameter binds to.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormParameter>FormParameter 建構函式所建立的物件會使用指定的參數名稱和識別繫結的參數的表單變數的字串初始化。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormParameter>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Type%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Direction%2A> properties are initialized with default values.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Type%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Direction%2A>屬性會初始化使用預設值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Direction%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Type%2A>

trans-unit.source: The name of the parameter.
trans-unit.target: 參數的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name of the form variable that the parameter object is bound to.
trans-unit.target: 繫結至參數物件的表單變數的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為<xref:System.String>.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormParameter"></xref> class, using the specified string to identify which form variable field to bind to.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormParameter"></xref>類別，來識別哪些變數欄位繫結至使用指定的字串。

trans-unit.source: The name of the parameter.
trans-unit.target: 參數的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The database type of the parameter.
trans-unit.target: 資料庫參數的類型。

trans-unit.source: The name of the form variable that the parameter object is bound to.
trans-unit.target: 繫結至參數物件的表單變數的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new named and strongly typed instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormParameter"></xref> class, using the specified string to identify which form variable to bind to.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新命名和強型別執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormParameter"></xref>類別，來識別要繫結的表單變數以指定的字串。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormParameter> object created with the FormParameter constructor is initialized with the specified parameter name, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Type%2A>, and string that identifies the form variable that the parameter binds to.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormParameter>FormParameter 建構函式所建立的物件會使用指定的參數名稱，初始化<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Type%2A>，和識別繫結的參數的表單變數的字串。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Type%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormParameter>

trans-unit.source: Only the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Direction%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.ConvertEmptyStringToNull%2A> properties are initialized with default values.
trans-unit.target: 只有<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Direction%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.ConvertEmptyStringToNull%2A>屬性會初始化使用預設值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.ConvertEmptyStringToNull%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Direction%2A>

trans-unit.source: The name of the parameter.
trans-unit.target: 參數的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The type that the parameter represents.
trans-unit.target: 型別參數所代表。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.TypeCode>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為<xref:System.TypeCode>.</xref:System.TypeCode>

trans-unit.source: The name of the form variable that the parameter object is bound to.
trans-unit.target: 繫結至參數物件的表單變數的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為<xref:System.String>.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Returns a duplicate of the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormParameter"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: 傳回目前的複本<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormParameter"></xref>執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The Clone method calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormParameter.%23ctor%2A> copy constructor to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormParameter> class with the values of the current instance.
trans-unit.target: 再製方法呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormParameter.%23ctor%2A>複製建構函式來初始化的新執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormParameter>類別目前的執行個體的值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormParameter> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormParameter.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormParameter"></xref> that is an exact duplicate of the current one.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormParameter"> </xref>這是目前的完全相符複本。

trans-unit.source: Updates and returns the value of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormParameter"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 更新，並傳回的值<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormParameter"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormParameter> attempts to bind to the form variable every time the Evaluate method is called.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormParameter>嘗試每次評估方法呼叫時，繫結至的表單變數。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormParameter>

trans-unit.source: The `context` parameter is used by the Evaluate method to retrieve the value of the specified form field from the request.
trans-unit.target: `context` Evaluate 方法使用參數來擷取要求的指定的表單欄位的值。

trans-unit.source: The `control` parameter is ignored.
trans-unit.target: `control`參數已忽略。

trans-unit.source: The current <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref> of the request.
trans-unit.target: 目前<xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref>的要求。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control"></xref> that is associated with the page where the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormParameter"></xref> is used.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control"> </xref>與頁面相關聯其中<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormParameter"></xref>用。

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the updated and current value of the parameter.
trans-unit.target: 物件，表示參數的已更新的目前值。

trans-unit.source: If the context or the request is null (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic), the Evaluate method returns null.
trans-unit.target: 如果內容或要求為 null (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref>在 Visual Basic 中)，評估方法會傳回 null。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the form variable that the parameter binds to.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定繫結的參數的表單變數的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The FormField identifies a name/value pair that is passed in the <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.Form%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: FormField 識別傳入的名稱/值組<xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.Form%2A>集合。</xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.Form%2A>

trans-unit.source: While the FormField property identifies the name of the pair, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormParameter> binds to its corresponding value at run time.
trans-unit.target: 雖然 FormField 屬性識別名稱的組，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormParameter>在執行階段繫結至其對應的值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormParameter>

trans-unit.source: If the expected form variable string name/value pair is not passed to the ASP.NET Web page in the collection, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormParameter.Evaluate%2A> method binds the parameter to the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.DefaultValue%2A> property, if it is set.
trans-unit.target: 如果預期的表單變數的字串名稱/值組不會傳送到集合中的 ASP.NET Web 網頁<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormParameter.Evaluate%2A>方法繫結的參數值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.DefaultValue%2A>屬性如果設定。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.DefaultValue%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormParameter.Evaluate%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.DefaultValue%2A> is not set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormParameter.Evaluate%2A> method fails to bind the parameter to a value.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.DefaultValue%2A>未設定，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormParameter.Evaluate%2A>方法時，無法將參數繫結的值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormParameter.Evaluate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.DefaultValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: A string that identifies the form variable to which the parameter binds.
trans-unit.target: 識別參數繫結的表單變數的字串。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the client input in the parameter is validated.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值會指出是否要驗證的輸入參數中的用戶端。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if client input is validated; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果已驗證用戶端輸入。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。
